amendment.description: Amendment requires the FCC to make additional disclosures on its web site and in its annual budget regarding its processing of Freedom of Information Act requests in order to increase transparency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-422 to make the FCC's handling of FOIA requests more open and transparent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walden amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Walden.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walden amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
